author: Coralie Kepa
comment: So far, it's awesome, I'm loving it. The only reason why I'm not giving it a 5 is because the last journal app I downloaded only gave me a trial period. So I'm hanging out for this atm to see if it stops me from writing. But so far, I'm enjoying it more than the last one which is what I was hoping for. Please don't kick me out! I need this journaling app or my life will be in chaos!!

reply.author: Two App Studio Pte. Ltd.
reply.content: Thanks for your review! Hope that you continue to enjoy this app.

author: Jeff Daly
comment: Looks interesting,  but it needs a bit of flexibility.  It seems so tied to Google services,  that I thought it was made by Google. I use OneDrive and would like to see backup and sync options,  using that.  Others use DropBox, which is also missing. For Fitness,  I use Samsung Health and also MyFitnessPal,  not Google Fit,  which is the only fitness service supported.    Straight away,  I was put off because I am not going to change multiple services to try this one.

reply.author: Two App Studio Pte. Ltd.
reply.content: Thanks for your review, we will send this to our developers.

author: Tina Hoefert
comment: Down graded rating for unhelpful  advice from developer in the reply.  I tried turning off Google fit in the setting and it did not help. It still says stationary on every diary entry no matter what I am doing and I have to manually change it to none.  Please add option to turn off the auto detection of your current activity. It is always wrong and I hate having to manually change it. Would prefer to have it show no activity unless you want to add it. I don't like being forced to use a feature I don't want. Otherwise 5 stars. I paid for the premium and I like it.

reply.author: Two App Studio Pte. Ltd.
reply.content: Hi Tina, you can turn off the Google Fit detection under settings.

author: Jonathan Jebasingh
comment: I absolutely love it but it would be great if we can add videos from our gallery or something like tag it.   That's one improvement I won't mind paying for. :)  Hope this is constructive feedback. Thanks !

reply.author: Two App Studio Pte. Ltd.
reply.content: thanks for the suggestion, we will send this to our developers!

author: Rukayyah Abdulrahman
comment: It is almost perfect. It will however be complete if there is title and categories included. Also one cannot search using the tags. That way, it will not provide easy access to one's entries. Please rectify this. Thank you.

reply.author: Two App Studio Pte. Ltd.
reply.content: thanks for the feedback, we will send this to our developers

author: Don'tMindMe :/
comment: I definitely loved the app. It's just that I only get to put a maximum of 4 pictures in an entry, so I would need to make another entry and then, put the pictures there which is pretty tiring and time consuming.

author: andy hanlan
comment: So far so good.  Does what it claims to do, haven't had any issues so far.

author: Comfy Womfy
comment: I'm liking it 😀 I purchased both iOS and android versions. I only wish I could export my diary as a PDF. I'd love it if we could get the sound effects like we have in the iOS version. Please 👍

reply.author: Two App Studio Pte. Ltd.
reply.content: Hi Comfy, you can export your entries as pdf, .docx, and .zip! The tutorial can be found here: https://support.2appstudio.com/articles/journey-android-share-and-export/

author: Nathan Daugherty
comment: Very intuitive and easy to get started. I like being able to attach images and tag posts. The time/date feature makes it easy to document more throughout the day. Font and colors are also very well done and easy on the eyes.

author: Pamela Derstine
comment: So easy to use, makes jounaling in the go super easy and well organized.

author: Valerie Hynd
comment: Seems pretty easy to use. Like the fact that you can add photos to your day. As this is the only journalling app I've tried, I don't have anything to compare it to.

author: Mohd Rozaidi Rusli
comment: I fall in love with this app.Premium feature purchased! Recommended!!! 👍👏👏👏❤

reply.author: Two App Studio Pte. Ltd.
reply.content: Hello Eddie, thank you for your support :)

author: Karen Haywood
comment: Love it! Have been looking for something like this for a long time. Can update on laptop and phone.

author: Carrie Chun
comment: Kid installed the paid festure accidentally. I requested for a refund within 1 min of the payment. Contacted the company twice and got declined with no explanation. Will not recommend any products from this company.

reply.author: Two App Studio Pte. Ltd.
reply.content: Sorry to hear that, Carrie. Unfortunately we are unable to process any refund requests through this channel. Do file a request on https://support.2appstudio.com/refund/ and our billing team will get back to you.

author: Alison Clark
comment: Wish you could attach photos and videos to the same post.

author: Laya Gaton
comment: Cool app! I love writing my thoughts anytime...and this app perfectly suits me.

author: Gerard Aguilar
comment: Therapy!!!!!..........I don't need to get emotional attention from outside my marriage. I just talk to my journal.

author: Galileo Sanchez
comment: Doesn't support audio entries
This journaling app is absolutely amazing. I love it. Very easy to use.

author: solomon eke
comment: I'm really enjoying this journal, easy and fun to use

author: Cecil Dsilva
comment: Love the app. This is now an important part of my life.

author: Adan Zuniga
comment: Good journal app

author: akash shiv shukla
comment: Fond of it. Thanks

author: Marie Kozey
comment: It's exactly what I needed love it!

author: Fiefie Yong
comment: The best app that suitable to me

author: Wei Sen Tee
comment: Nice interface. Love it!

author: Viplov Singh
comment: Awsome app 😆

reply.author: Two App Studio Pte. Ltd.
reply.content: Hello, thank you for your support :)

author: G Malhotra
comment: Great!

author: Son Light
comment: Great for journaling

author: anantha padmanabhan
comment: Goood

author: Arpan Vinayak
comment: Very beautiful app. I have a doubt. The Premium IAP, is that for lifetime? Or is it monthly?

reply.author: Two App Studio Pte. Ltd.
reply.content: Thanks Arpan! Our premium lisence for Android is for lifetime. However, if you subscribe to the Cloud Membership, it unlocks premium across all platforms, but is payable on a monthly or annual basis.

author: Pratik Navlani
comment: I think it's a perfect journal for all ages ❤ I was searching for an assistant like this...this helps me keep up my day along with my other tasks. But I was thinking that after I'm done with my tasks they are cancelled but they just get Bunched there....I mean they should be removed from the list as soon as the day's plan finishes.

author: Jeb Jennings
comment: Practically everything about this app is amazing, and I suggest it to everybody whenever the subject comes up. I enjoy the feel, the ease of use, the tags, the ability to add photos (and gifs), and tracking locations and weather.   Outside of journaling, I also use it as a recipe tracker, and I'm sure there are many other uses for it. It's a wonderful app.  One thing though: I would give 4.5 if I could, only because there is no option to search through your tags. Possibly I'm doing it wrong by creating 100's of tags, but it's a pain when I need to scroll through a majority of them. If I could search for the tag I wanted this would easily be a 5.

reply.author: Two App Studio Pte. Ltd.
reply.content: Thank you for the feedback. I will send this feedback to our developers ;)

author: Ahmet A
comment: I operate a camping and use this to record my guest entry and info- as a camping management app. Perfect. Thanks to developers. Integrates with google and qr code apps. Very useful for me. Only big problem for me is that it cannot be moved to SD card. My LG magna has very limited inner memory.

reply.author: Two App Studio Pte. Ltd.
reply.content: Hello Ahmet, thank you for your kind review :)

author: Andreas Toth
comment: I just opened the app because I was going to write an entry about how much I love this simple app and how apt the name of it is. There are two issues, though, one is that one must go into edit mode to copy from an entry and the second issues is that the desktop/web version is only available on subscription. I'm not keen on that for this kind of app.

reply.author: Two App Studio Pte. Ltd.
reply.content: Thanks Andreas! We will take your suggestion into consideration.

author: Zachary Smith
comment: Very cool app. The features of even just the free version are fabulous. I particularly enjoy the atlas feature. If you want to one day be able to look back over your life story, chart the ups and downs, and relive the most important moments, I encourage you to start using Journey today

reply.author: Two App Studio Pte. Ltd.
reply.content: Thanks for your kind words, Zachary!

author: Melia Paramita
comment: I immediately bought the premium version. I like it so much, especially the night mode, because I feel calmer when it's darker, if you know what I mean. It will be nice if I can change my profile picture, and the journal to be locked right away when I shift to another app since it doesn't, but so far so good.

Well! I love everything about this app. I write in my journal actually but it's not possible to carry it everywhere and that's where the journey app comes in handy! Adding the photos is an amazing feature! I'm totally in love with this ❤️

author: Rajesh Jose
comment: Have been using it for couple of years. Very nice app. I click most of my photos through this app, only issue is...it takes 3 clicks to get to camera. I added the widget to directly open camer in home page, yet it tkaes multiple clicks. Its very annoying to do this every time, would be nice if there is a way to get to camera in this apps context in just one click...two intermediate steps looks unnecessary - one window to choose +icon...when i click on camera button, it is always a first photo in a new event, so thats window not required...2nd window to choose video/camera which i can do in camera app itself..that also not required

reply.author: Two App Studio Pte. Ltd.
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback, we will send recommendation to our developers.

comment: Edit: I've used this app for years now. This app has improved over the years and I still love it. Finger print login, multiple photos per entry, hashtag support, it's got it all. If any journal so is worth your money, this one is. I forget what I paid for it, but whatever it was is worth it.  I am almost a week in using this app at the time I write this review. I first had a problem where my software keyboard refused to work correctly. 2 App Studio got back really fast to help fix my problem. It managed to work itself out and now works great! Now I get why everyone has given 4 or 5 stars. I would like to see a feature where you can take multiple pictures per journal entry and then get to pick which one you want for the title picture, but there are easy workarounds to this. Great product.

reply.author: Two App Studio Pte. Ltd.
reply.content: Hi Gabe K, thanks for the review. We are glad that we could assist you in making Journey your perfect journal. Cheers. Edit: Thanks for the revised review!
